DI-001.name: Address Line 1
DI-001.rule: A component of a metering point site address. There are defined parts of the address for each address line.

DI-002.name: Address Line 2
DI-002.rule: A component of a metering point site address

DI-003.name: Address Line 3
DI-003.rule: A component of a metering point site address

DI-004.name: Address Line 4
DI-004.rule: A component of a metering point site address

DI-005.name: Address Line 5
DI-005.rule: A component of a metering point site address

DI-006.name: Address Line 6
DI-006.rule: A component of a metering point site address

DI-007.name: Address Line 7
DI-007.rule: A component of a metering point site address

DI-008.name: Address Line 8
DI-008.rule: A component of a metering point site address

DI-009.name: Address Line 9
DI-009.rule: A component of a metering point site address

DI-010.name: Metering Point Postcode
DI-010.rule: The full postcode of the metering point site.

DI-015.name: Connection Type Indicator
DI-015.rule: A code to indicate the type of connection at the metering point.

DI-016.name: Connection Type Effective From Date
DI-016.rule: The date and time from which the metering point Connection Type is in effect.

DI-017.name: Consent Granularity
DI-017.rule: Describes the granularity of energy settlement data that a customer has deemed to have consented to.

DI-018.name: Consent Granularity Effective From Date
DI-018.rule: The date from which the consent granularity was in effect.

DI-019.name: Contract Reference Metering Service
DI-019.rule: The unique reference of the contractual agreement between a supplier and the Metering Service.

DI-020.name: Contract Reference Data Service
DI-020.rule: The unique reference of the contractual agreement between a supplier and the data service.

DI-021.name: Customer Direct Contract Metering Service
DI-021.rule: An indicator to show if a direct customer contract exists between the customer and the Metering Service provider.

DI-022.name: Customer Direct Contract Data Service
DI-022.rule: An indicator to show if a direct customer contract exists between the customer and Data Service provider.

DI-023.name: Data Service Effective From Date
DI-023.rule: The Date from which the Data Service was Appointed

DI-025.name: DCC Service Flag
DI-025.rule: A DCC provided flag to indicate the status of the services being provided by the DCC to a Metering Point.

DI-026.name: DCC Effective From Date (DCCF)
DI-026.rule: The first inclusive calendar date for which the status of the DCC Service flag applies.

DI-027.name: Disconnection Effective From Date
DI-027.rule: The date on which the connection point is physically removed from the metering system.

DI-028.name: Reconnection Effective From Date
DI-028.rule: The date on which the connection point is physically reconnected to the metering system.

DI-029.name: Distributor ID
DI-029.rule: The market-wide unique reference for the distributor who is responsible for the distribution network that a metering point is connected to.

DI-030.name: Domestic Premise Indicator
DI-030.rule: A flag that indicates if the MPAN of the registration appointment is used to identify a domestic premise.

DI-031.name: Load Shape Domestic Premise Indicator
DI-031.rule: The Domectic Premise Indicator associated with a Load Shape

DI-032.name: Domestic Premise Indicator Effective From Date
DI-032.rule: The date from which the metering point Domestic Premise Indicator is in effect.

DI-033.name: Energisation Status
DI-033.rule: Indicates if the metering point is considered energised (i.e. connected to the distribution system) and therefore active for settlement purposes.

DI-034.name: Energisation Status Effective From Date
DI-034.rule: The settlement date and time from which an energisation status is in effect for a metering system.

DI-035.name: Energy Direction
DI-035.rule: Indicates the direction of energy at a metering point. Values can be I = import / E = export.

DI-036.name: GSP Group ID EffectiveFrom Date
DI-036.rule: The date and time from which the GSP Group ID is in effect for the metering system.

DI-037.name: GSP Group ID
DI-037.rule: Identifies the distinct grid supply point group (physical region of the country) where the metering point is located.

DI-038.name: Associated Import/Export MPAN
DI-038.rule: When this metering point is part of an import/export pair, this identifies the related import or export metering point. Where more than one import MPAN exists, this shall be populated with the Primary Import MPAN.

DI-039.name: Load Shape GSP Group ID
DI-039.rule: The GSP Group ID associated with a Load Shape

DI-040.name: Annual Load Shape Total
DI-040.rule: Annual consumption associated with a particular Load Shape

DI-041.name: Load Shape 7 Day Rolling Off-peak Total
DI-041.rule: The sum of the 7 day rolling Off-Peak total (kWh) using the Off-Peak total for the UTC date plus the last 6 UTC dates

DI-042.name: Load Shape 7 Day Rolling Peak Total
DI-042.rule: The sum of the 7 day rolling Peak total (kWh) using the Peak total for the UTC date plus the last 6 UTC dates

DI-043.name: Load Shape 7 Day Rolling Total
DI-043.rule: The sum of the 7 day rolling total (kWh) using the total for the UTC date plus the previous 6 UTC dates

DI-044.name: Load Shape Day Off-Peak Total
DI-044.rule: The sum of Period Values for settlement periods (kWh) (1 to 14) or (2 to 15). UTC times Midnight -7pm

DI-045.name: Load Shape Day Peak Total
DI-045.rule: The sum of Period Values (kWh) for settlement periods (15 to 48) or (1 and 16 to 48). UTC times 7pm - Midnight

DI-046.name: Load Shape Day Total
DI-046.rule: The sum of all Period Values for the UTC Date.

DI-048.name: Manufacturers Make and Type
DI-048.rule: The manufacturer's make name and type number of a Meter

DI-051.name: Market Segment Indicator Effective From Date
DI-051.rule: The date from which the metering point Market Segment is in effect.

DI-052.name: Measurement Quantity ID
DI-052.rule: Identifies the type of the quantity that is measured by the UTC Period Consumption Value.

DI-053.name: Meter ID (Removed)
DI-053.rule: Serial number of the removed physical meter.

DI-054.name: Meter Asset Provider Effective From Date
DI-054.rule: The inclusive calendar date from which the meter asset provider is in effect for the metering system.

DI-055.name: Meter Asset Provider ID
DI-055.rule: The market-wide reference for the provider of the meter equipment.

DI-056.name: Meter ID
DI-056.rule: Serial number of the physical meter.

DI-057.name: Meter Installation Date/Time
DI-057.rule: The date of installation for a meter at a metering point.

DI-058.name: Meter Removal Date/time
DI-058.rule: The date when the meter was removed from a metering point.

DI-059.name: Meter Type
DI-059.rule: The type of meter, in relation to its capabilities. E.g. AMR.S1, S2, S2ADE

DI-060.name: Modified Meter ID
DI-060.rule: Updated/ Corrected Serial number of the physical meter.

DI-061.name: Metering Service Effective From Date
DI-061.rule: The Date from which the Metering Service was Appointed

DI-063.name: MPAN Core
DI-063.rule: A business key used to uniquely identify the metering point that is the subject of the update.

DI-073.name: Principal MPAN
DI-073.rule: The Principal MPAN in a Related/Linked MPAN Relationship

DI-074.name: Subsidiary MPAN
DI-074.rule: The subsidiary MPAN in a Related/Linked MPAN Relationship

DI-075.name: Primary MPAN
DI-075.rule: The primary in a related MPAN relationship. The primary is associated with the base load settlement configuration (contains no value, if not part of related MPAN pair).

DI-076.name: Estimation Reason Code {e}
DI-076.rule: Reason why Data Service had to provide Estimated/Zero Data

DI-077.name: CSS RMP Deactivation Date
DI-077.rule: The Date on which the CSS considers the MPAN to have been deactivated / terminated.

DI-079.name: Secondary MPAN
DI-079.rule: The secondary in a related MPAN relationship.

DI-081.name: Settlement Period Duration
DI-081.rule: The settlement period duration in minutes.

DI-082.name: Settlement Period Effective To Date/Time
DI-082.rule: The UTC end date and time of the settlement period for a consumption value.

DI-083.name: Settlement Period Quality Indicator {q}
DI-083.rule: Describes if the UTC Period Consumption Value is an actual or what estimation method was used to estimate it.

DI-085.name: Electricity Smart Meter Equipment (ESME ID)
DI-085.rule: The Electricity Smart Meter Equipment GUID is the unique identifier for a Smart electricity This is also known as the DCC GUID and is further defined within the DCC interface specifications.

DI-086.name: Supplier Effective From Date
DI-086.rule: The date and time from which a supplier came into effect, with regard to their relationship with the metering point.

DI-088.name: Cumulative Register Reading
DI-088.rule: The value of the Cumulative meter register at a specified date and time.

DI-089.name: Cumulative Register Reading Date / Time
DI-089.rule: The date and time [in UTC] of the Cumulative Register Meter Read.

DI-090.name: Meter Location
DI-090.rule: The actual location of the metering system within the site

DI-091.name: Number of Displayed Register Digits
DI-091.rule: The number of digits prior to the decimal point displayed by the total cumulative register of a smart meter

DI-092.name: Nature of Maintenance
DI-092.rule: Details of the tests, maintenance and replacement work done by the Meter Operator on the meters, communications equipment and links in a Metering System.

DI-093.name: Additional Information
DI-093.rule: A free format character string for providing additional details.

DI-094.name: Reading Method
DI-094.rule: Indicates how the Cumulative meter reading was obtained/derived

DI-096.name: Site Visit Check Code
DI-096.rule: A code identifying either nature of checks made/to be made on metering equipment during a site visit or identifying reason for failure to obtain readings.

DI-097.name: Failure to Energise/de-energise reason code
DI-097.rule: The reason why the Energisation or De-Energisation has not been carried out.

DI-098.name: Supplier Notification Expiry Date
DI-098.rule: The Date from which a Supper Notification [to DS] Expires

DI-099.name: Configurable Register Reading Date /Time
DI-099.rule: The date and time [in UTC] of a Configurable Register Meter Read. This should be considered to be midnight where an exact time is unavailible

DI-100.name: Supplier Notification Effective From Date
DI-100.rule: The Date from which a Supper Notification [to DS] becomes Effective From

DI-101.name: UTC Settlement Date
DI-101.rule: UTC Date for which data applies

DI-102.name: Load Shape Period Value
DI-102.rule: Consumption Value (kWh) for the UTC Period Duration within a Load Shape.

DI-103.name: Configurable Register ID
DI-103.rule: Register ID relating to a specific configurable (billing) register on a Smart/Advanced Meter

DI-104.name: Configurable Register Reading
DI-104.rule: Reading associated to a specific Register ID on a Smart/Advanced Meter

DI-108.name: Distributor DIP ID
DI-108.rule: The DIP ID of the distributor who is responsible for the distribution network that a metering point is connected to.

DI-109.name: Distributor DIP EZ Name
DI-109.rule: The DIP EZ Name of the distributor who is responsible for the distribution network that a metering point is connected to.

DI-111.name: Green Deal Effective From Date
DI-111.rule: The date from which a Green Deal agreement is considered to be in place.

DI-112.name: Green Deal Effective To Date
DI-112.rule: The date to which a Green Deal agreement is considered to be in place.

DI-120.name: Additional Information
DI-120.rule: A free format character string for providing additional details.

DI-121.name: Outgoing Supplier Effective To Date
DI-121.rule: The last inclusive settlement date after which a Supplier's registration to a metering system ceases to be valid.

DI-122.name: Profile Class
DI-122.rule: A legacy classification, maintined by Suppliers, retained soley to assist with the undertsading of allocation of gross consumption to individual Settlement Periods.

DI-123.name: SSC
DI-123.rule: A legacy classification, maintined by Suppliers, retained soley to assist with the undertsading of allocation of gross consumption to individual Settlement Periods.

DI-124.name: Profile Class Effective From Date
DI-124.rule: The Date from which the current Profile Class became Effective

DI-125.name: SSC Effective From Date
DI-125.rule: The Date from which the current Profile Class became Effective

DI-126.name: Traditional / Fall Back Read Frequency
DI-126.rule: Supplier requested Traditional / Fall Back Meter Reading Frequency

DI-127.name: Metered Indicator
DI-127.rule: An indicator to show whether the Consumption Component is for a metered supply or unmetered supply.

DI-128.name: DUOS Tariff ID
DI-128.rule: Reference to identify the DUoS Tariff assigned to an MPAN

DI-129.name: DUOS Tariff ID EffectiveFrom Date
DI-129.rule: Date on which DUoS Tariff came into effect

DI-130.name: RMP Status (Registration)
DI-130.rule: The MPAN RMP Status as held in the Registration Service

DI-131.name: MP Status
DI-131.rule: The MP or Trading Status as held in the Registration Service

DI-134.name: SMSO
DI-134.rule: The Id of the operator a Supplier has procured data and communication services from in respect of a Metering System (applies only to certain types of SMETS1 Metering).

DI-135.name: SMSO Status Effective From Date
DI-135.rule: The first inclusive calendar date that a Smart Metering System Operator ID is the provider of communications services to a Metering System (applies only to certain types of SMETS1 Metering).

DI-136.name: IHD Status Effective From Date
DI-136.rule: The first inclusive calendar date that an a notable IHD status was provided.

DI-137.name: IHD Install Status
DI-137.rule: Information regarding the In Home Display at a metering point.

DI-138.name: Customer Direct Contract Data Service DIP ID
DI-138.rule: The DIP ID of the Data Service that has recorded the existence of a Customer Direct Contract for that MPAN.

DI-140.name: Customer Direct Contract Metering Service DIP ID
DI-140.rule: The DIP ID of the Metering Service that has recorded the existence of a Customer Direct Contract for that MPAN.

DI-143.name: Proposed Appointment Response Code
DI-143.rule: A code which defines the Appointment Request Outcome.

DI-145.name: Customer Direct Contract Metering Service EffectiveTo Date
DI-145.rule: Date on which Customer Direct Contract Metering Service Ends

DI-146.name: Customer Direct Contract Data Service EffectiveTo Date
DI-146.rule: Date on which Customer Direct Contract Data Service Ends

DI-147.name: UTC Period Consumption Value {v}
DI-147.rule: Consumption Value (kWh/kVARh) for the UTC Period Duration.

DI-149.name: Annual Consumption EffectiveFrom Date
DI-149.rule: Date on which Assumed Annual Consumption was Calculated/is Effective From

DI-151.name: Linked MPAN Energy Direction
DI-151.rule: Energy Direction of the Linked MPANs

DI-152.name: Supplier Nominated Annual Consumption
DI-152.rule: Supplier Nominated Annual Consumption Value, to be used as required by Data Service in preference to the ECS calculated Annual Consumption

DI-153.name: UTC Period Consumption Value (Defaulted)
DI-153.rule: Consumption Value (kWh/kVARh) for the UTC Period Duration.

DI-154.name: Default Load Shape Flag
DI-154.rule: A flag to identify the period value is based on a default calculation.

DI-155.name: Settlement Impacted Data Service DIP ID
DI-155.rule: DIP ID of the Data Service appointed for Defaulted SP

DI-157.name: Settlement Impacted Supplier DIP ID
DI-157.rule: DIP ID of the Supplier Responsible for Defaulted SP

DI-159.name: Settlement Run Execution Date
DI-159.rule: Date/Time at which Settlement Run was Executed

DI-160.name: Settlement Code
DI-160.rule: A code which, together with the Settlement Date, identifies a Settlement published in the Settlement Timetable. It identifies the type of Settlement.

DI-161.name: Run Number
DI-161.rule: The identifier, unique within an Agent system, which identifies a run of that system.

DI-162.name: Consumption Amendment Supplier Reference
DI-162.rule: Supplier's Unique Reference Number for Consumption Amendment Request

DI-167.name: RMP Status Effective From Date
DI-167.rule: The Effective From Date of MPAN RMP Status as held in the Registration Service

DI-168.name: MP Status Effective From Date
DI-168.rule: The Effective From Date MP or Trading Status as held in the Registration Service

DI-192.name: GPF (Gas) GUID
DI-192.rule: Comms Hub Associated Gas GUID (if available)

DI-196.name: MDR Request Reference Date
DI-196.rule: Reference Date for which data should be recovered from the meter

DI-206.name: Service Provider Appointment Requesting Supplier MPID
DI-206.rule: Service Provider Appointment Requesting Supplier MPID

DI-300.name: Consumption Component Class ID
DI-300.rule: Valid values are in the range 100 --> 999

DI-500.name: MHHS Regime End Date
DI-500.rule: The last Settlement Date which MPAN will be subject to MHHS Settlement Regime.

DI-501.name: Reverse Migration Incoming MOP MPID
DI-501.rule: MPID for the next/incoming MOP following Reverse Migration

DI-502.name: Reverse Migration Incoming MOP Effective From Date
DI-502.rule: The Date from which MOP appointment is/was effective following Reverse Migration

DI-503.name: Reverse Migration Incoming DC MPID
DI-503.rule: MPID for the next/incoming DC following Reverse Migration

DI-504.name: Reverse Migration Incoming DC Effective From Date
DI-504.rule: The Date from which DC appointment is/was effective following Reverse Migration

DI-510.name: Off Peak Declaration Date
DI-510.rule: Settlement Day to which OPD should be applied

DI-511.name: Off Peak Declaration Proportion
DI-511.rule: Proportion (%) of consumption to be considered as Off-Peak

DI-800.name: Service Provider Appointment Scenario
DI-800.rule: Code used to identify the scenario around Service Provider Appointment

DI-801.name: Import/Export MPAN Supplier DIP ID
DI-801.rule: DIP ID of the Supplier Responsible for the Linked MPAN

DI-803.name: Incoming Supplier DIP ID
DI-803.rule: The market-wide unique reference for a supplier that is responsible for the settlement liabilities.

DI-805.name: Outgoing Supplier DIP ID
DI-805.rule: The market-wide unique reference for a supplier that is responsible for the settlement liabilities.

DI-807.name: Incumbent Metering Service DIP ID
DI-807.rule: This is the Metering Service with responsibility for an MPAN at the point a Proposed Appointment Request is 'Accepted' by a Prospective Metering Service. This party is responsible for providing the Prospective MS with MTDs for Traditional and Advanced Meters.

DI-809.name: Current Metering Service DIP ID
DI-809.rule: DIP ID of the Metering Service Appointed at the point message was created by the Registration Service, i.e. the Currently Appointed Metering Service

DI-811.name: Current Data Service DIP ID
DI-811.rule: DIP ID of the Data Service Appointed at the point message was created by the Registration Service, i.e. the Currently Appointed Data Service

DI-813.name: De-Appointed Metering Service DIP ID
DI-813.rule: DIP ID for the Metering Service subject to De-Appointment

DI-815.name: Metering Service Effective To Date
DI-815.rule: The Date at which the Metering Service is De-Appointed.

DI-816.name: De-Appointed Data Service DIP ID
DI-816.rule: DIP ID for the Data Service subject to De-Appointment

DI-818.name: Data Service Effective To Date
DI-818.rule: The Date at which the Data Service is De-Appointed.

DI-819.name: De-Appointment Reason Code
DI-819.rule: A code indicating reason for termination of Service Provider Appointment

DI-822.name: Incoming Metering Service DIP ID
DI-822.rule: DIP ID for the next/incoming Metering Service

DI-824.name: Incoming MS EffectiveFrom Date
DI-824.rule: The Date from which next/incoming Metering Service appointment is/was effective

DI-825.name: Incoming Data Service DIP ID
DI-825.rule: DIP ID for the next/incoming Data Service

DI-827.name: Incoming Data Service Effective From Date
DI-827.rule: Incoming (Next) Data Service Effective From Date

DI-828.name: Proposed Metering Service DIP ID
DI-828.rule: DIP ID of Metering Service supplier proposes should be appointed to an MPAN

DI-830.name: Proposed MS EffectiveFrom Date
DI-830.rule: Date at which Supplier would like proposed Metering Service appointment to take effect

DI-831.name: Proposed Data Service DIP ID
DI-831.rule: DIP ID of Data Service supplier proposes should be appointed to an MPAN

DI-833.name: Proposed DS Effective From Date
DI-833.rule: Date at which Supplier would like proposed Data Service appointment to take effect

DI-834.name: Supplier Nominated MDR DIP ID
DI-834.rule: The market-wide unique reference for a specific Meter Data Retriever (MDR)

DI-836.name: Supplier Nominated MDR Effective From Date
DI-836.rule: Date from which Supplier would like Nominated MDR to apply

DI-837.name: Supplier Proposed Domestic Premise Indicator
DI-837.rule: Supplier proposed DPI for a SP Appointment

DI-838.name: Supplier Proposed Consent Granularity
DI-838.rule: Supplier proposed Consent Granularity for a SP Appointment

DI-839.name: SDS Nominated MDR DIP ID
DI-839.rule: DIP ID of the MDR the SDS has requested to be assigned to an MPAN

DI-841.name: SDS Nominated MDR Effective From Date
DI-841.rule: Date from which Supplier would like Nominated MDR to apply

DI-842.name: Assigned MDR DIP ID
DI-842.rule: DIP ID of the MDR assigned to an MPAN

DI-844.name: Assigned MDR EffectiveFrom Date
DI-844.rule: The Effective Date from which the MDR Effective Date to be recorded as in Registration and DCC

DI-845.name: Issuing Data Service DIP ID
DI-845.rule: DIP ID of the Data Service submitting the data

DI-847.name: Service Provider App Requesting Supplier DIP ID
DI-847.rule: DIP of Supplier making the Service Appointment Request

DI-849.name: CSS Registration ID
DI-849.rule: The CSS identifier associated with a Supplier's Registration

DI-850.name: MDR Effective To Date
DI-850.rule: The Date at which the MDR stops collecting data.

DI-966.name: Distribution Variant Version ID
DI-966.rule: Version Number of the Distribution Variant

DI-967.name: Distribution Variant Issued Date
DI-967.rule: Publication Date of the Distribution Variant

DI-968.name: Distribution Variant Format
DI-968.rule: File Type of the Distribution Variant Components (e.g. JSON/CSV/PDF File)

DI-979.name: Response Code
DI-979.rule: Code used to identify the outcome of the Event Request

DI-980.name: Response Message
DI-980.rule: Message describing the status/outcome of the previous originating transaction

DI-992.name: Schema Version
DI-992.rule: The Scheme Version against which the message has been constructed

DI-999.name: Event Code
DI-999.rule: Code used to identify the nature of the Event

B040_EnergisationFailure.title: B040 - Failure to Action Site Energisation Status Chg

B048_UTCSettlementDefaulted.title: B048 - UTC Settlement Period Consumption Defaulted Data

B047_UTCSettlementConsumption.title: B047 - UTC Settlement Period Consumption Data (Mandatory)

B069_AdvisoryMeterID.title: B069 Supplier Advisory Notification Meter ID

B012_RequestingSupplier.title: B012 Service Provider Appointment Requesting Supplier (Mandatory)

B020_CDC_MS_Info.title: B020 - Customer Direct Contract MS Info

B021_CDC_DS_Info.title: B021 - Customer Direct Contract DS Info

B084_MDR_Consumption.title: B084 - MDR Settlement Period Consumption Data (Mandatory)

interfaces.name: Notification of Change of Supplier
interfaces.description: Notification of Change of Supplier
interfaces.receiver: Incoming Supplier (SUP), Marketwide Data Service (MDS), LDSO
interfaces.context: Following a successful Change of Supplier, the CSS will notify this to the Registration Service. The Registration Service will then notify parties that a successful Change of Supplier has taken place. This provides the Gaining Supplier with key information about the MPAN as it currently exists in the Registration Service.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: B013 CSS Registration Request ID (Mandatory)
B002 - Incoming Supplier Information - Mandatory for Event [ChangeOfSupplier] & [InitialRegistration]
B003 - Outgoing Supplier Information - Mandatory for Event [ChangeOfSupplier]
B005 - Incumbent / Outgoing Service Providers (Mandatory for [ChangeOfSupplier] (where available in Registration Service)
B006 - Customer Direct Contracts (Mandatory if Customer Direct Contract is Registered/Recorded)
B027- Assumed Annual Consumption (Mandatory where available in Registration Service)
B029 - DCC Enrolment Status (Conditionally Mandatory - Required only for Smart Meters if available)
B032 - MPAN Legacy Info (Mandatory for Traditional Meters / Optional for other Meters OR where not available in Registration Service)

composition.title: B035 blocks below are repeated for each Linked Import/Export MPAN

composition.titleOverride: B035 - Linked Import / Export MPAN (Mandatory if Linked MPAN Exists)

composition.title: B037 blocks below are repeated for each Related MPAN available in Registration Service

interfaces.name: Notification to New Supplier of Site Information
interfaces.description: Notification to New Supplier of Site Information
interfaces.context: Following notification of a potential/pending Switch from CSS, the Registration Service will issue this message to the incoming Supplier to advise the incoming Supplier of Site Information so that the Supplier can determine the correct Service Providers to appoint (this is the equivilent to the D0217/D0260)

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: B013 CSS Registration Request ID (Mandatory)
B005 - Incumbent/Outgoing Service Providers (Mandatory - Where available in Registration Service)
B006 - Customer Direct Contracts (Mandatory if Customer Direct Contract is Registered/Recorded)
B027- Assumed Annual Consumption (Mandatory where available in Registration Service)
B029 - DCC Enrolment Status (Conditionally Mandatory - Required only for Smart Meters if available)
B030 - MPAN IHD Information (Optional)
B032 - MPAN Legacy Info (Mandatory for Traditional Meters / Optional for other Meters OR where not available in Registration Service)

composition.title: *B905 - B074 and B075 Blocks below are repeated for each Installed Meter

composition.titleOverride: B074 - MPAN Existing Meter Info (Mandatory if Metering Installed)
> B075 - MPAN Existing Meter Map Info (Mandatory for each Meter Provided) - Most Recent Record only for each B074 Meter provided above

composition.title: *B907 - B035 block below is repeated for each Linked Import/Export MPAN

composition.titleOverride: B035 - Linked Import / Export MPAN (Mandatory if Linked MPAN Exists)

composition.title: >*B910 B036 & B075 below repeated for each Meter /MAP History pair

composition.titleOverride: > *B036 - Linked Import/Export Meter Details
>> *B075 - MPAN Linked Meter Map Info (Mandatory for each Meter Provided) - Most Recent Record only for each B074 Meter provided above

composition.title: *B908 - B037 blocks below is repeated for each Related MPAN that exists
>*B911 - B038 & B075 below repeated for each Meter /MAP History Pair

composition.titleOverride: > B038 - Related MPAN Meter Details
>> B075 - MPAN Related Meter Map Info (Mandatory for each Meter Provided) - Most Recent Record only for each B074 Meter provided above

interfaces.name: Notification of Reverse Migration and Deappointment
interfaces.description: Notification of Reverse Migration and Deappointment
interfaces.receiver: Data Service (ADS, SDS, UMSDS) / Metering Service (MSA, MSS, UMSO) / LDSO / MDS / Supplier
interfaces.context: This provides Notification of a Reverse Migration to MDS/LDSO. It also advises MHHS Service Providers that they have been De-Appointed (as a result of a Reverse Migration) and where appropriate details of the incoming 'old regime' agents i.e. MOP / DC.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: B013 CSS Registration Request ID (Mandatory)
B094- Reverse Migration Notification (Mandatory for Event [ReverseMigNotification])
B008 - Metering Service De-Appointment Details (Mandatory for [MSDeAppRM])
B009 - Data Service De-Appointment Details (Mandatory for [DSDeAppRM])
B095- Incoming MOP Details (Mandatory for Event [MSDeAppUpdateRM] ) and where available in the Registration Service - Ref Interface Notes
B096 - Incoming DC Details (Mandatory for Event [DSDeAppUpdateRM] ) and where available in the Registration Service - Ref Interface Notes
B002 - Incoming Supplier Information (Mandatory)

interfaces.name: Comms Hub Information (Optional)
interfaces.description: Optional interface to allow passing of Comms Hub information
interfaces.context: Use of this interface is optional. It is provided for use by Smart Metering Services & Suppliers that bilaterally agree to share Comms Hub information between themselves.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: B093 - Comms Hub Info (Mandatory if Event = [CommsHubInfo])

interfaces.name: Metering Service MTD Updates to Registration
interfaces.description: To notify the Registration Service of Metering related Data Item changes, for example, New install, Removal, MEX, change to existing Meter Details
interfaces.sender: Metering Service Smart (MSS) & Metering Service Advanced (MSA)
interfaces.context: This interface is used by Metering Services to notify any changes required to Metering Technical Information, to the Registration Service For example, Meter Installations, Removals and Exchanges. The interface also allows for corrections to the currently installed meter & the historical record of installed metering assets.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: B033 - New/Revised Meter Information (Mandatory if Event = [MeterInstall], [MeterExchange], [MeterUpdate], [MeterHistoryUpdate])
> B034 Meter MAP Info (Mandatory for Events [MeterInstall], [MeterExchange]; Optional for Events [MeterUpdate], [MeterHistoryUpdate])
B039 Removed Meter Information (Mandatory for Event Type [MeterRemoval], [MeterExchange]; Optional for Event [MeterHistoryUpdate] & [MeterUpdate])
B030 - MPAN IHD Information (Optional & may only be used with [MeterInstall] , [MeterExchange] & [MeterUpdate])

interfaces.name: Notification of Metering Service MTD Update to Registration
interfaces.description: Outcome of Metering Service Request to Update Registration after Install, Removal, MEX or Updates to Existing Meter
interfaces.receiver: Metering Service (MSS, MSA), Data Service (SDS, ADS) , Supplier (SUP), LDSO, EES & MDR
interfaces.context: This interface is used by Registration Service to notify the outcome of changes of Metering Technical Information to the Metering Service, and if successfull other participants. For example, Meter Installations, Removals and Exchanges. This response also includes confirmation of other existing meter(s) installed at the MPAN, which were not impacted by the Metering Event.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: B033 - New/Revised Meter Information (Mandatory if Event = [MeterInstall], [MeterExchange], [MeterUpdate], [MeterHistoryUpdate])
> *B034 - Meter MAP Info (Mandatory for Events [MeterInstall], [MeterExchange]; Optional for Events [MeterUpdate], [MeterHistoryUpdate])
B039 - Removed Meter Information (Mandatory for Event Type [MeterRemoval], [MeterExchange]; Optional for Event [MeterHistoryUpdate] & [MeterUpdate])
B030 - MPAN IHD Information (Optional & may only be used with [MeterInstall] & [MeterExchange], [Meter Update])
*B074 - MPAN Existing Meter Details (Mandatory if additional meters are Installed) - Repeated for each "Installed Meter" not impacted by the message
> *B075 - Existing Meter MAP Info (Mandatory for each Meter Provided) - Most Recent Record provided for each B074 Additional meter

interfaces.name: Change of Energisation Status
interfaces.description: This interface is used by the Metering Service to notify the Registration Service of changes to the energisation status or to inform the Supplier where a request to change the energisation status has been rejected.
interfaces.sender: Metering Service Smart (MSS) & Metering Service Advanced (MSA), Unmetered Supplies Operator (UMSO)
interfaces.receiver: Registration Service (REGS), Supplier (SUP) (Failed to action only)
interfaces.context: This interface is used by the Metering Service to notify the Registration Service of changes to the energisation status or to inform the Supplier where a request to change the energisation status has been rejected.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: B025 - Energisation Status (Mandatory if EventCode = [EnergisationStatusChange])
B040 - Failure to Action Site Energisation Status Chg (Mandatory if EventCode = [EnergisationStatusFailure])

interfaces.name: Notification of Change of Energisation Status Request
interfaces.description: This interface is used by Registration Service to notify the outcome of Change of Energisation Status Requests.
interfaces.receiver: Metering Service (MSS, MSA, UMSO), Data Service (SDS, ADS, UMSDS), Supplier (SUP), LDSO, Market-wide Data Service (MDS), EES & MDR
interfaces.context: This interface is used by Registration Service to notify the outcome of Change of Energisation Status Requests.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: B025- Energisation Status (Mandatory if EventCode = [EnergisationStatusChange])

interfaces.name: Notification of MPAN Disconnection/Termination
interfaces.description: This interface is used by Registration Service to notify participants that an MPAN has been Disconnected by LDSO and/or terminated by CSS. It is no longer possible to register an MPAN following this point.
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), LDSO, Market-wide Data Service (MDS), EES
interfaces.context: This interface is used by Registration Service to notify participants that an MPAN has been Disconnected by LDSO and/or terminated by CSS. It is no longer possible to register an MPAN following this point.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: B041 - MPAN Disconnection Information (Mandatory for [MPANDisconnection])
B098 - MPAN Reconnection Information (Mandatory for [MPANReconnection])
B042 - MPAN CSS De-Registration Information (Mandatory for [CSSDeRegistration])

interfaces.name: Notification of Defaulted Consumption
interfaces.description: This interface will be issued by ECS/MDS to advise Supplier, Data Service and if required the LDSO of the volume(s) for each Settlement Period which have been Defaulted
interfaces.receiver: Data Services - Smart Data Service (SDS) / Advanced Data Service (ADS) / UMSDS / Supplier (SUP) / LDSO
interfaces.context: This interface will be issued by ECS/MDS to advise Supplier, Data Service and if required the LDSO of the volume(s) for each Settlement Period which have been Defaulted

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: > B050 - ECS CCC Determination Data (Mandatory) - Block Repeated for each variation in CCC Determination Data
>> B046 - UTC Settlement Date (Mandatory) - Block Repeated for each UTC Settlement Day as required
>>> B048 - UTC Settlement Period Consumption Defaulted Data (Mandatory for EventCode =[ActivePowerDefaulted]) - Block Repeated as Required

interfaces.name: Rejection of Consumption Data/Warning
interfaces.description: Rejection of Data Service provided Actual or Estimated UTC Settlement Period Consumption data/ Warning of Consumption on a De-energised MPAN
interfaces.context: Rejection of Data Service provided Actual or Estimated UTC Settlement Period Consumption data/ Warning of Consumption on a De-energised MPAN

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: > B046 - UTC Settlement Day (Block below Repeated for each UTC Settlement Date)
>> B047 - UTC Settlement Period Consumption Data (Mandatory) - Block below Repeated for each UTC Settlement Consumption Period as Required

interfaces.name: Request for Consumption Replay
interfaces.description: This interface is used by Advanced Data Services to request a Replay of historic Consumption submissions for a newly acquired MPAN, from the DIP.
interfaces.context: This interface is used by Advanced Data Services to request a Replay of historic Consumption submissions for a newly acquired MPAN, from the DIP.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

interfaces.name: Consumption Replay
interfaces.description: This interface is used by the DIP in order to Replay historic Consumption submissions for a newly acquired MPAN, back to the Advanced Data Service.
interfaces.context: This interface is used by the DIP in order to Replay historic Consumption submissions for a newly acquired MPAN, back to the Advanced Data Service.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: R0 - Response (Mandatory for [ActivePowerRejected] )
B044 - Submitting Data Service (Mandatory for [ActivePower], [ReactivePower] and [ActivePowerRejected])
B043 - Impacted Participants (Mandatory for [ActivePowerDefaulted])
B049 - Settlement Run Info (Mandatory for [ActivePowerDefaulted])
B067 - Connection Type (Mandatory except for [ReplayRequestRejected])
B045- MQID ( Mandatory for [ActivePower], [ReactivePower] and [ActivePowerRejected] )
> B050 - ECS CCC Determination Data (Mandatory for [ActivePowerDefaulted]) - Block Repeated for each variation
>> B046 - UTC Settlement Day Mandatory except [ReplayRequestRejected] - Block(s) below Repeated for each UTC Settlement Date as Required
>>> B047 - UTC Settlement Period Consumption Data ( Mandatory for [ActivePower], [ReactivePower] and [ActivePowerRejected] )
>>> B048 - UTC Settlement Period Consumption Defaulted Data (Mandatory for [ActivePowerDefaulted])

interfaces.name: Notification of LDSO Maintained Data Changes
interfaces.description: This interface is to notify participants of changes to Registration Service Data Items, principally those maintained by the LDSO or notified to Registration Service directly by CSS
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Data Service (ADS, SDS, UMSDS), Metering Service (MSA, MSS, UMSO) , Market-wide Data Service (MDS), EES & LDSO
interfaces.context: This interface is to notify participants of changes to Registration Service Data Items, principally those maintained by the LDSO or notified to Registration Service directly by CSS

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: B013 CSS Registration Request ID (Mandatory if available in Registration Service)
B001 - GSP EffectiveFrom (Mandatory for Events [AddressChg] & [GSPChg])
B022 - MPAN Address (Mandatory for Events [AddressChg] & [GSPChg])
B023 - MPAN Connection Info (Mandatory for Events [EnergyDirection], [MUMIndicator])
B024 - MPAN DUOS Tariff ID (Mandatory for [DUOSTariffIDChg] )
B028 - Domestic Premise Indicator (Mandatory for Event [DomPremInd])
B029 - DCC Enrolment (Mandatory for Event [DCCEnrolment]) (Mandatory for Commissioned Smart Meters)

interfaces.name: Request to Create/Change MPAN Relationship
interfaces.description: Interface to allow Supplier to request/specify the Creation, Addition or Removal of MPAN(s) from a MPAN Relationship - either an Import/Export or Related MPAN grouping.
interfaces.context: Interface to allow Supplier to request/specify the Creation, Addition or Removal of MPAN(s) from a MPAN Relationship - either an Import/Export or Related MPAN grouping.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: *B090- MPAN Relationship Subsidiary MPAN (Mandatory) - Group below repeated for each Secondary MPAN as Required

interfaces.name: MPAN Relationship Response
interfaces.description: Interface providing the Registration Service Response to an MPAN Relationship request to create/change.
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Data Service (ADS, SDS), Metering Service (MSS, MSA), LDSO & EES
interfaces.context: Interface providing the Registration Service Response to an MPAN Relationship request to create/change.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: M1 - MPAN Relationship Principal MPAN (Mandatory)

composition.title: B090 - MPAN Relationship Subsidary MPAN Group below repeated for each Secondary MPAN as Required

composition.titleOverride: *B090 - MPAN Relationship Subsidiary MPAN (Mandatory)
B091 - MPAN Relationship Additonal Information (Optional)
B035 - Linked Import / Export MPAN (Mandatory if Linked MPAN Exists) - *B907 block repeated for each Linked I/E MPAN in the group
> *B036 - Linked Import/Export Meter Details - *B910 B036 & B075 below repeated for each Meter /MAP pair
>> *B075 - MPAN Linked Meter Map Info (Mandatory for each Meter Provided) - Most Recent Record only for each B036 Meter provided above

interfaces.name: Provide Settlement Period Consumption
interfaces.description: Data Service will provide Actual or Estimated UTC Settlement Period Consumption data (Active and where appropriate Reactive), for each MPAN, for each day that they are appointed.
interfaces.sender: Data Services - Smart Data Service (SDS) / Advanced Data Service (ADS) / UMSDS
interfaces.receiver: Load Shaping Service (LSS) / Market-wide Data Service (MDS) / Distributor (LDSO) / Supplier (SUP)
interfaces.context: Data Service will provide Actual or Estimated UTC Settlement Period Consumption data (Active and where appropriate Reactive), for each MPAN, for each day that they are appointed.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: B045 - MQID (Mandatory)
> *B046 - UTC Settlement Day (Mandatory) - Block below Repeated for each UTC Settlement Date
>> *B047- UTC Settlement Period Consumption Data (Mandatory) - Block below Repeated for each UTC Settlement Consumption Period as Required

interfaces.name: Provide Load Shape Period Data
interfaces.description: Central settlement will calculate Settlement Period Load Shapes on a daily basis. These new load shapes are created for each UTC Settlement Period of a UTC Settlement Date and must be delivered to the Data Services, within agreed timescales, so as to allow for Data Service Validation & Estimation processes to operate in an accurate & timely fashion.
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Data Services (ADS, SDS, UMSDS), Public (via separate file-sharing mechanism)
interfaces.context: Central settlement will calculate Settlement Period Load Shapes on a daily basis. These new load shapes are created for each UTC Settlement Period of a UTC Settlement Date and must be delivered to the Data Services, within agreed timescales, so as to allow for Data Service Validation & Estimation processes to operate in an accurate & timely fashion.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: *B046 - UTC Settlement Day
> *B051 - Load Shape Criteria (Mandatory), Repeated for each combination of LS Criteria
>> *B052 Load Shape Period Data (Mandatory), Repeated for each Settlement Period

interfaces.name: Provide Load Shape Totals Data
interfaces.description: Central settlement will calculate Settlement Period Load Shapes on a daily basis. These new load shapes are created for each UTC Settlement Period of a UTC Settlement Date and must be delivered to the Data Services, within agreed timescales, so as to allow for Data Service Validation & Estimation processes to operate in an accurate & timely fashion.
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Data Services (ADS, SDS, UMSDS), Public (via separate file-sharing mechanism)
interfaces.context: Central settlement will calculate Settlement Period Load Shapes on a daily basis. These new load shapes are created for each UTC Settlement Period of a UTC Settlement Date and must be delivered to the Data Services, within agreed timescales, so as to allow for Data Service Validation & Estimation processes to operate in an accurate & timely fashion.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: * B046 - UTC Settlement Day
> *B051 - Load Shape Criteria (Mandatory), Repeated for each combination of LS Criteria
> B054 - Load Shape Annual Consumption, Repeated for each combination of LS Criteria
>> *B053 Load Shape Total Data (Mandatory), Repeated for each Combination of Load Shape Criteria

interfaces.name: Notification of Data Service Influencing Circumstances
interfaces.description: Notification to the Data Service of circumstances which may impact or influence Data Service treatment of a site
interfaces.context: Notification to the Data Service of circumstances which may impact or influence Data Service treatment of a site

interfaces.name: Notification of Service Provider Appointment Status
interfaces.description: Registration Service Notification on Appointment Status. This could be that Appointment has been Accepted or Rejected by Service Provider; has become Lapsed (i.e. could not be successfully matched with a SecuredActive Switch). It is also used to advise the Incumbent Metering Service to issue MTDs to incoming Service Providers.
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP), Incumbent Metering Service, Data Service (ADS, SDS, UMSDS), Metering Service (MSA, MSS, UMSO)
interfaces.context: Registration Service Notification on Appointment Status. This could be that Appointment has been Accepted or Rejected by Service Provider; has become Lapsed (i.e. could not be successfully matched with a SecuredActive Switch). It is also used to advise the Incumbent Metering Service to issue MTDs to incoming Service Providers.

composition.titleOverride: B007 - Service Provider Appointment Outcome (not required for [SDS-MDROutcome], [DCC-MDROutcome])

B071 - Proposed Data Service Details (Mandatory for Event [DSAppAccepted],[DSAppRejected],[DSAppLapsed])

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: B020 - Customer Direct Contract MS Info ~ Mandatory for event [DirectContractMSAdd]
B021 - Customer Direct Contract DS Info ~ Mandatory for event [DirectContractDSAdd]

interfaces.name: Annual Consumption (AC)
interfaces.description: Used to send an ECS (Elexon Calculation Service) Calculated Annual Consumption (AC) to a Registration Service. IF-040 is only used for Profile Class 03, 04, 05, 06, 07 and 08 MPANs.
interfaces.context: Used to send an ECS (Elexon Calculation Service) Calculated Annual Consumption (AC) to a Registration Service. IF-040 is only used for Profile Class 03, 04, 05, 06, 07 and 08 MPANs.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

interfaces.name: Smart / Advanced Readings
interfaces.description: New Interface to exchange Exchange, Smart and Smart COR Meter Readings between MHHS Parties
interfaces.receiver: Advanced Data Service (ADS) and Smart Data Service (SDS) / Supplier (SUP)/ LDSO
interfaces.context: This interface is to allow Cumulative Reads and/or, Smart/Advanced Register Redings, to be exchanged in a number of business scenarios. Following MHHS implementation, in most cases consumption values will be available directly from the meter. However, there may be occasions when consumption may not be available, therefore a Cumulative Reading will need to be captured/shared as a 'fall back' measure

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

composition.titleOverride: * B064 - Cumulative Reading Information (Conditionally Mandatory) - Block Repeated for each Meter(s) associated with the MPAN
* B065 - Meter Configurable Register Reading (Conditionally Mandatory) - Block Repeated for each set of Configured Register(s) for each Meter

interfaces.name: Change of Connection Type
interfaces.description: Used by the Registration Service (REGS) to notify the DCC of a change in connection type for a given MPAN, i.e. a change in connection from LV with CT to LV with CT/WHOLE CURRENT.
interfaces.context: Used by the Registration Service (REGS) to notify the DCC of a change in connection type for a given MPAN, i.e. a change in connection from LV with CT to LV with CT/WHOLE CURRENT.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

interfaces.name: Registration Service Notification of Change of Segment
interfaces.description: Registration Notification of a Successful Change in Market Segment
interfaces.context: Registration Service Notification of a Change in Market Segment

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

interfaces.name: Registration Service Reminder Notification
interfaces.description: Reminder Notification to a Supplier that some element of Registration Data is inconsistent or invalid, & action is required to resolve it
interfaces.receiver: Supplier (SUP)/ Advanced Data Service (ADS) and Smart Data Service (SDS) / Advanced Metering Service (MSA) and Smart Metering Service (MSS)
interfaces.context: Reminder Notification to a Supplier that some element of Registration Data is inconsistent or invalid, & action is required to resolve it

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

interfaces.name: Notification of the Publication of a Downloadable Asset
interfaces.description: URI Listing showing location of Downloadable Resources (For example ISD)
interfaces.context: The purpose of this interface is to notify DIP Participants of the Publication of a Downloadable Asset, such as ISD or other Reports, and the URI that can be used to access the publication.

composition.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)
> P01 Block Below Repeated for each Distribution Variant

interfaces.name: EES Updates
interfaces.description: The purpose of this interface is to provide updates to EES from the Registration Service which are not required to be serviced by any other interface.
interfaces.context: Registration Service sends this to provide updates to EES which are not required to be serviced by any other interface.
